ygData.subject: cant wear armor?
ygData.msgSnippet: I now have my Bard almost to Level 5, having alot of fun so far.  I sometimes find things like sleeves or shoes or scarves on corpses but when i try and wear
ygData.messageBody:
I now have my Bard almost to Level 5, having alot of fun so far. I
sometimes find things like sleeves or shoes or scarves on corpses but
when i try and wear the items it says in red letters "your
race/class/diety (etc...)" and it won't let me use the items. I also
tried to buy a training tunic, same message. The item (tunic or some
such) that i got when i first talked to the guildmsater is gone
because i died a bunch of times and couldnt find my corpse (now i
have locating lyric which is just awesome) So my question is, What
armor *Can* I wear? I am a Half-Elf Quelious Bard is that
restricting me somehow? Should I learn how to sew and make my own
stuff? Is it the fact that I am still below level 5?

Also I have kept giving spiderling silk to the guildmaster and every
so often i get a gold piece, some experience and a drum. I have 4
drums now do I need to keep them or should i just keep 1 of them?
Sorry if I'm asking silly questions, but that's what newbies like me
are for aint it? :)

that is all...

-fohat
